name: Jack Tripper And Friends Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Jack, Janet, Cindy and Teri spend some vacation time visiting a farm. To whom does the farm belong?
questions.explanation:
Cindy's aunt.

	Jack seeks refuge from a goon who is chasing him. Cindy and Teri and Janet go to the farm with Jack. Larry, the real culprit, shows up later with Furley.

questions.text: Jack and Larry compete for the same woman. Jack is at his job when he sees her with Larry. What is his job?
questions.explanation:
Mechanical man.

	Janet tries to keep Jack and Larry from finding out the truth.

questions.text: Jeffrey Tambor played all of the following roles EXCEPT for one of these. Which one?
options: Neighbor to the Ropers in their new home
questions.explanation:
Judge.

	He played the stuffy neighbor who dreaded the idea of having Mr. Roper as a neighbor. He also played a dentist who is dumped by Teri and later treats Jack. In addition, he played a psychiatrist who worked at Teri's hospital.

questions.text: Jack is attracted to Chrissy's visiting friend. What does the friend do for a living?
questions.explanation:
Call girl.

	Elaine Giftos plays a savvy call girl; Chrissy doesn't know the truth.

questions.text: Mr. Roper is particularly fond of which of the following?
questions.explanation:
Cocoa.

	Roper's liking for cocoa is mentioned in any number of episodes.

Airplane.

	She's a stewardess; he's a nervous passenger.

questions.text: Who saved a choking person by performing the Heimlich Maneuver?
questions.explanation:
Jack.

	Jack saves a fellow who rewards Jack by giving him a great opportunity ... that turns out to be bogus.

questions.text: Which of the following guest starred on the series?
questions.explanation:
Loni Anderson.

	Loni Anderson appeared as a shallow woman in whom Jack was interested- until he discovered her true character.

questions.text: Jack tries to impress a girl by convincing her that he is an expert at what sport?
questions.explanation:
Skiing.

	Janet tries to give Jack a crash course in the basics of skiing. It doesn't quite work.

questions.text: Jack, Chrissy and Janet come into some money. Each decides to splurge. What does Chrissy buy?
questions.explanation:
Stuffed animal.

	Chrissy splurges on a stuffed giraffe. Jack and Janet are amazed.
